title: The ymage of loue Here foloweth a goostly pamphlete or mater co[m]pendyously extract of holy scrypture, and doctours of ye chyrche, called ye ymage of loue, very necessary for all vertuous persones to loke vpon.
author: Ryckes, John.
publicationStmtDate: The yere of our lorde. M.CCCCC. [and] xxv. [1525] The vij. daye of October]
publicationStmtPublisher: In the Flete strete at the sygne of the Sonne by Wynkyn de worde,
